snippet: The English goth rockers Sisters of Mercy were an early inspiration for the designer Alexandre Plokhov, who paid proper tribute in his recent collection.
abstract: The English goth rockers Sisters of Mercy were an early inspiration for the designer Alexandre Plokhov, who paid proper tribute in his recent collection.
lead_paragraph: Kevin Tachman's New York fashion week photo diary.

headline.main: Photos of the Moment | Alexandre Plokhov
